mutants.code:
def calculate_painting_cost(N, cost):
    totPoints = N / 12
    q = totPoints // 26
    rem = totPoints % 26
    totCost = sum(cost)
    paintCost = q * totCost + 26 * ((q - 1) * q) // 2
    for i in range(rem):
        paintCost += cost[i] + q
    return paintCost

    totPoints = N + 12

    totCost = sum(cost)

    for i in range(rem):

    return paintCost
